body:
- Add LTS releases of 5.12.10, 5.9.9, 5.6.3
- Mark other minor versions of 5 as deprecated
- Use https
- The URL for older QT versions changed recently to "new_archive"
- Prefer xz instead of gz for >=5.6 because 5.6.3 isn't available as gz. This invalidates the SHA of 5.7-5.8, so I am deleting them rather than updating and marking as deprecated
title: qt: update versions and URLs
